title: How to watch Man United vs FC Twente in the Europa League on TV and live stream
body_text:
How to watch Man United vs FC Twente in the Europa League on TV and live stream
Erik ten Hag's side play their first game in the newly revamped UEFA Europa League on Wednesday
Manchester United kick off their latest European campaign on Wednesday as they face FC Twente in the UEFA Europa League. The teams will play in the first season of the newly revamped competition, which has seen the group stage transformed into a single 36-team league stage.
Each Europa League side will face eight different teams this season, with the top eight advancing straight to the round of 16. Those placed from ninth to 24th will play in knockout round play-off matches, with the winners also going through to the last 16.
After this, the remaining teams will play straight knockout games through to the final. Man United have endured a sticky start to the season, with Erik ten Hag’s side currently 11th in the Premier League with just two wins from five.

Their Dutch opponents are fourth in the Eredivisie and enjoyed a comfortable 5-0 win against Almere on Sunday (September 22). United fans can be hopeful though, as the club has had success in the Europa League, having lifted the trophy for the first time in the 2016/17 season after a 2-0 win against Ajax in the final.
However, their more recent European campaigns have been less fruitful. Last season, United were knocked out in the group stage of the Champions League as they finished bottom beneath Bayern Munich, FC Copenhagen and Galatasaray.
But the squad has welcomed a raft of new faces since then, with Joshua Zirkzee and Matthijs de Ligt joining over the summer alongside Dutch Man United legend Ruud van Nistelrooy, who now serves as assistant manager. So as the 2024/25 Europa League kicks off, here’s how you can watch Man United vs FC Twente on TV and streaming platforms.
When is Manchester United vs FC Twente?
Manchester United vs FC Twente is scheduled to kick off at 8pm on Wednesday, September 25, live from Old Trafford.
How to watch Manchester United vs FC Twente in the Europa League
Football fans in the UK can watch Manchester United vs FC Twente live on TNT Sports 1, with pre-game action starting at 7pm. TNT Sports is available with a subscription to Discovery+ Premium, which can be joined via Amazon’s Prime Video for £30.99 and includes action from the Premier League, UEFA Champions League and Europa League.
TNT Sports will show more than 500 Champions League and Europa League games this season, as well as boxing, NBA, Premiership Rugby, MotoGP, WWE and more. There’s no contract with a Discovery+ subscription as it can be joined on a rolling month-by-month basis and cancelled at any time.
As well as all this top sporting action, Discovery+ members can enjoy an Amazon Prime 30-day free trial, which includes a mountain of blockbuster films and TV shows on Prime Video, plus free next-day delivery on eligible Amazon purchases. TNT Sports is also available with EE’s TV and broadband plans, which currently come with hundreds of pounds in savings.
EE’s Big Sport plan has been slashed to £10 a month for three months – then £45 a month – and includes 12 Sky Sports channels, Discovery+ Premium and TNT Sports with a £105 saving. Bagging the Big Sport plan alongside EE’s Full Fibre 150 broadband costs £10 a month for the first three months, saving a whopping £206.97.
